---
title: "HKDataProcess"
format: html
---

```{r}
# load packages and functions
source("R/packages.R")
source("R/functions.R")

HK <- read_csv("../data/hongkong/HongKongData.csv")

HKclean <- HK |>
  select(
    part_id = pid,
    part_age = age,
    gender = sex,
    contacts = n.contact.total
  ) |> 
  mutate(
    part_id = as_factor(part_id),
    part_age = as_factor(part_age),
    gender = as_factor(gender)
  )


```
